DOC.brief_summary: This trial is going to evaluate the value of blood-oxygen functional imaging technology in the diagnosis of breast diseases.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Application of Breast Blood-oxygen Functional Imaging Technology
DOC.criteria: female older than 18 years breast lump received breast ultrasound and mammography After coreneedle biopsy or resection After neoadjuvant chemotherapy, radiotherapy or endocrine therapy
